title: Ward skins no sound animation
body: Sometimes, when during a team fight; when i place a ward down i cant hear the sound animation. I really like hearing the Christmas sound on the candy-cane ward it's being placed down.

replies.body:
Hey AgentYun - 

Are you using a trinket or a ward from a Sightstone/Vision ward?

Originally, this was working as intended, but we're working to get these on other ward-types due to the changes in the season where you can no longer just buy a green ward. ^-^ I want to say it's in 6.3? If not shortly after!
